position.description: Linear position along slide axis

distance_to.description: Distance to another asset - dynamic property (e.g., distance_to_apple, distance_to_gripper)

contains.description: Check if specific object is inside this container

full.description: True when at capacity (defined in config)

num_contained.description: Count of objects currently inside (parameterizable - customize object count threshold)

extended.description: True when position exceeds threshold (parameterizable - customize extension distance)

handle_grabbed.description: True when robot gripper contacts drawer handle (via per-geom contact tracking)

sliding.description: True when drawer is actively moving (velocity > threshold)

distance_to.description: Distance to another asset - dynamic property (e.g., distance_to_apple, distance_to_gripper)

contact.description: Detect contact between surface and object

contact_force.description: Contact force magnitude on this surface

distance_to.description: Distance to another asset - dynamic property (e.g., distance_to_apple, distance_to_gripper)

contact_force.description: Total force from contacts (gripper touching object)

held_by.description: Contact force from specific gripper/holder (relational property like distance_to, contact)

height.description: Z coordinate (height above ground) - parameterizable for custom height thresholds

rolling.description: True when angular velocity exceeds threshold

stationary.description: True when angular velocity near zero

stacked_on.description: List of objects this is stacked on (below)

supporting.description: List of objects stacked on top (above)
